RelatedSentence: The European Union ( EU ) fully supports the OSCE Minsk Group 's recent statement on the 20th anniversary of the ceasefire agreement .
The aforementioned is noted in the statement which the EU has issued with respect to the Nagorno - Karabakh conflict .
The [ ceasefire ] agreement put an end to the open war , but it did not resolve the conflict .
The [ ceasefire ] agreement put an end to the open war , but it did not resolve the conflict .
The European Union is deeply concerned by the armed incidents along the Line of Contact and the large number of casualties .
We condemn the use of force , and urge the parties [ to the conflict ] to keep away from all possible actions that escalate the tension .
We condemn the use of force , and urge the parties [ to the conflict ] to keep away from all possible actions that escalate the tension .

We urge the parties to strictly adhere to the ceasefire and to maintain restraint .

The European Union reiterates its full support to the [ Minsk Group ] Co-Chairs to contribute to a political , equitable , and durable settlement of the conflict in Nagorno - Karabakh .
We invite the parties to a constructive dialogue and encourage them .
The European Union again expresses its support to all the principles proposed by the presidents of the Republic of France , US , and the Russian Federation .

The European Union stands ready to make more active efforts for the settlement of the conflict , [ and ] in support of the Minsk Group , the EU statement also specifically runs .
